trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There was one other sighting in Houston on or around August 7th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI live in far west Houston in Fort Bend county off of FM 1464. Went out on my front porch for a smoke last night around 9:15 PM. The air felt wierd, but it was very calm and quite. About 9:20 PM loud hum began and the neighborhood dogs began to bark. There was then a flash of bright light above me and to my left. I was facing and looking east. I looked up and saw a slow moving, very bright light that turned yellow, then blinked a couple of times before turning orange. Followed it for about 5 to 10 seconds before it turned north and disappeared or excelerated upward at a very high speed. It semed to blend in with the stars. Afterwards and today I am feeling very energized.
